text: The Alligator People is a 1959 American science fiction horror movie directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring Beverly Garland, Bruce Bennett, Lou Chaney Jr., George Macready, Richard Crane, Frieda Inescort, Douglas Kennedy. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 horror movies Category:1959 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Del Ruth
title: The Alligator People
